para.emphasis: Declarative programming is a new topic for many readers. We need to explain how JavaFX Script relates to Java and how Declarative Programming simplifies this relationship.
A chapter on Declarative programming should probably describe how JavaFX Script calls into the JRE to access Java classes, and which classes it can access.
Can JavaFX Script and Java code be mixed in the same scipt? How? Under what conditions? How does it work?
We probably need a block diagram that shows how the JavaFX Script product ties into its wrapper libraries to access Java Swing classes in the JRE via JavaPlayer.
How do I put a JavaFX sript into a browser? How do I put a JavaFX Script on my local desktop as a stand-alone application? How do I write a JavaFX applet?
Can JavaFX Script instantiate a Java class? Yes; and we need to explain how and when we do this; and how JavaFX accesses the JRE)
Can Java instantiate a JavaFX Script class? (I don't know, but I imagine it is possible. When would we do this? My general question: Can we mix JavaFX and Java source in the same file? How? Why?
